page.title: 09SONS OF ANNANDALE
page.content: Many well(and some less well)-known names have made their mark on present day Upper Annandale.These include:- {THE JOHNSTONE FAMILY}whose stronghold Lochwood Tower can still be seen and whose descendants are major landowners {JOHN McADAM}of tar macadam fame who lies buried in the old Kirkyard. {LORD DOWDING}head of RAF fighter command during the Battle of Britain and born in Moffat in 1882. {WILLIAM DICKSON}who worked with Wilberforce on the abolition of slavery. These,and many others including{ {Robert Burns,Hume and Johnstone}found this lovely spot an excellent place to live or to visit.In recognition of the wealth of local history a group of townspeople set out to preserve the past by opening a small museum on the site of a former bakehouse.
